title: Script font ID needed
content:
Hey font guru’s, once again I come to you for font identification.

Does anyone know what this script may possibly be? Or what is very close to it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163255im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lindylu_4521.jpg)

Thanks guys.

Bryan

 [‹ Mystery Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163255/http:/typophile.com/node/45159 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID: humanist serif from Elle Decor ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163255/http:/typophile.com/node/45141 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid

comments.content:
Hello there,

It’s Lorrenne

p@

edit: I guess it may be named something else as discussed [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163255/http:/www.typophile.com/node/8503)
